title: looking for Goodwin, Ginter, Kimball champions
author: 1880nonsports

posts.post_title: looking for Goodwin, Ginter, Kimball champions
posts.post_content:
Willing to pay strong prices for my missing cards or trade liberally from my large pre-1920 tobacco collection. 

N162 Goodwin - trying to finish higher grade set vgx/x (need 15 cards) and low grade set with clean fronts and BD (need 7 cards)

N43 Ginter - need about 13 low grade commons and vgx or better Edwards (boxer - LAST CARD WILL OVERPAY :-))

N184 Kimball - looking for 17 cards for the 75 card master set - vgx or better

N36 - large Ginter Indians - need about 20 low grade examples.
What n43s do you need?  If I have one you need I wood be interested in a trade for a card featuring a woman such as those sold recently in sterling.  Thanks

posts.post_title: that would a pretty stiff trade
posts.post_content:
but I have no n360's to trade. I need quite a few low grade examples of the N43's - I pay 40.-75. should old fashioned dollars be of any interest and I can provide a list. I'd pay significantly more for a nice Edwards or Wood.
Appreciate the head's up though. I've sold the women BB players before in the 800. - 1000. range although the condition was significantly better. The request for the one's in sterling is for a friend. Miss my set but I've moved on.....

I had nearly complete sets of a few different series of women BB players but alas all have been sold but for a single type. I DO need the slocum for my low grade set but apparently I have nothing to trade you want including money. If you ever change your mind or I find a card for you - always interested until I fill the slot :-)
